library(dplyr)
library(sf)
library(here)

csv <- read.csv(here("FAOSTAT_data_en_11-3-2023.csv"))

filtered_data <- csv %>%
  group_by(Area) %>%
  filter(Value == max(Value)) %>%
  ungroup()

world <- st_read(here("BNDA_simplified.shp"))

joined_data <- world %>%
  left_join(filtered_data, by = c("nam_en" = "Area"))

st_write(joined_data, "joined_data.shp")
